game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin deep in the forest. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a legendary sword

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must explore the dense forest and discover the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
The artifact is located on a pedestal in the heart of the ruins. Take it carefully.
